src:
#Instagramdown Lagi dan Lagi
05 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Josina - detikInet


Ilustrasi Instagram. Foto: Youtube

Jakarta - Twitter kembali diramaikan dengan curhatan netizen soal tumbangnya Instagram yang terjadi kesekian kalinya. Tagar #Instagramdown kembali menjadi trending topic di Twitter di Indonesia.Dipantau di situs Downdetector, Instagram di Indonesia khususnya di Pulau Jawa memiliki tanda merah yang mengartikan kawasan tersebut memang sedang mengalami gangguan. Sebanyak 85% mengeluhkan tidak bisa melihat news feed, 10% tidak bisa log-in dan 5% tidak bisa posting foto ataupun video. Jika dilihat dari keluhan netizen, down-nya Instagram sudah dialami sebagian pengguna sejak pagi tadi.


Instagram Down. Foto: screenshot

Selain di Indonesia, Instagram juga tumbang di sejumlah kota di berbagai negara seperti New York dan Los Angles di Amerika Serikat, Kanada di Toronto, hingga Tokyo, Jepang.Cuitan-cuitan kekesalan hingga kata-kata kocak netizen pun ditumpahkan di Twitter.
















Simak Video "Respons Facebook-Twitter soal Denda Rp 100 Juta Kominfo"

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

(jsn/rns)
text:
#Instagramdown Again and Again
05 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Josina - detikInet


Instagram illustration. Photo: Youtube

Jakarta - Twitter is again enlivened by the complaints of netizens about the fall of Instagram which happened the umpteenth time. The hashtag #Instagramdown has become a trending topic on Twitter in Indonesia. Monitored on the Downdetector website, Instagram in Indonesia, especially in Java, has a red sign that means the region is indeed experiencing disturbances. As many as 85% complained that they couldn't see the news feed, 10% couldn't log in and 5% couldn't post photos or videos. If seen from netizens' complaints, Instagram's downtime has been experienced by some users since this morning.


Instagram Down. Photo: screenshot

In addition to Indonesia, Instagram also collapsed in a number of cities in various countries such as New York and Los Angles in the United States, Canada in Toronto, to Tokyo, Japan.
















Check out the video "Facebook-Twitter response about a fine of Rp. 100 Million of Communication and Information"

[Gambas: 20sec video]
